Case Study #1: Boosting Efficiency at a Real Estate Company

Company Profile:
A mid-sized real estate firm in Quezon City with 35 employees and three branch offices.

Challenge:
The company had multiple aging printers that were often offline. Delays in printing property documents and contracts were affecting client satisfaction and slowing sales processes.

Solution:
They switched to a centralized copier rental plan featuring one high-speed multifunction copier per branch, equipped with automated scanning, duplex printing, and remote monitoring features.

Case Study #2: Cost Reduction for a Growing BPO

Company Profile:
A business process outsourcing company serving international clients with 200+ employees.

Challenge:
The internal support team was printing around 60,000 pages per month, mostly HR documents, schedules, and compliance reports. Their owned fleet of copiers was outdated and expensive to maintain.

Solution:
The company partnered with a rental provider for a volume-based copier rental plan, replacing owned machines with three commercial-grade copiers leased on a per-page basis.

Result:

  • â‚±22,000/month in cost savings due to reduced toner and repair expenses

  • Zero capital expenditure on new machines

  • Faster turnaround for internal documents

Lesson Learned:
Switching from ownership to rental allows fast-growing companies to avoid the heavy burden of hardware depreciation and maintenance.

Case Study #3: Event Success with Short-Term Copier Rentals

Client:
A national conference with over 5,000 attendees and 30 exhibitors.

Challenge:
The event required on-site printing and copying of registration forms, badges, and marketing materials. Organizers needed a reliable, short-term solution that could handle high volume for a few days only.

Solution:
Two high-capacity copiers were rented and installed 48 hours before the event, with on-call technical support included.

Result:

  • Smooth registration process with over 1,200 badges printed on-site

  • No downtime thanks to the provider's backup support unit

  • Positive feedback from attendees and partners

Lesson Learned:
Short-term copier rentals are perfect for events. With flexible rates and rapid deployment, organizers can ensure hassle-free printing during peak days.

Case Study #4: Sustainability for a Law Office

Company Profile:
A boutique law firm in Makati City focused on environmental and human rights law.

Challenge:
The firm wanted to reduce its carbon footprint and improve document security while still handling high volumes of sensitive documents.

Solution:
They chose an eco-friendly copier rental model with Energy Star certified devices, secure print release functions, and automatic sleep modes.

Result:

  • Reduced electricity consumption by 27%

  • Paper waste dropped by 38% due to smarter duplex defaults

  • Demonstrated alignment with their advocacy values

Lesson Learned:
You donâ€™t need to compromise between performance and principles. Modern copier rental services offer sustainability options that align with both business and social responsibility.
